metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44758 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heimdal before 7.7.1 allows attackers to cause a NULL pointer dereference in a SPNEGO acceptor via a preferred_mech_type of GSS_C_NO_OID and a nonzero initial_response value to send_accept.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44758` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heimdal-clients - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
heimdal-kcm - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
heimdal-kdc - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
heimdal-multidev - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
heimdal-servers - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libasn1-8-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libgssapi3-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libhcrypto4-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libhdb9-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libheimbase1-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libheimntlm0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libhx509-5-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libkadm5clnt7-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libkadm5srv8-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libkafs0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libkdc2-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libkrb5-26-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libotp0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libroken18-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libsl0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libwind0-heimdal - 7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> the fix commit solely can cause build failures on tests, a follow-up commit to fix it should be 953d9442.

criterions.comment: heimdal package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.7.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3').
